lead_paragraph: A federal judge will not let the former business partner of the convicted lobbyist Jack Abramoff change his guilty plea in light of a recent Supreme Court ruling.
snippet: A federal judge will not let the former business partner of the convicted lobbyist Jack Abramoff change his guilty plea in light of a recent Supreme Court ruling.

headline.main: Lobbyist Not Allowed to Change Plea
headline.print_headline: Lobbyist Not Allowed to Change Plea
